Translations.Text: Recall ti Moses dir al his popol O my popol memor di blessings vi Li appointed prophets vi far vi regx granted vi ki Li neniam granted any ali popol
O my popol enter holy land ti DI dekret vi ne ribel lest vi igx losers
Ili dir O Moses tie est powerful popol gxi ni ne enter gxi ili get gxi. Ili get ni entering
hom reverent ben DI dir Just enter gate Vi just enter gxi vi surely prevail Vi fid DI vi est believers
Ili dir O Moses ni neniam enter gxi long as ili est gxi! Do ir! - Vi your Lord - Kaj batal! Ni sid dekstr here
Li dir My Lord mi nur control my frat. Tial allow us part kompani wicked popol
Li dir Henceforth gxi forbidden them 40 jar which ili roam ter aimlessly. Ne grieve such wicked popol
